an4.172:2.1: “Reverends, I realized the textual analysis of the meaning—piece by piece and expression by expression—a fortnight after I ordained.
an4.172:2.2: In many ways I explain, teach, assert, establish, clarify, analyze, and reveal it.
an4.172:2.3: Whoever has any doubt or uncertainty, let them ask me,
an4.172:2.4: I will answer. Our teacher is present, he who is so very skilled in our teachings.
